title: Outside building
description: You are outside a tall gloomy building. There is a door here, to the north

title: Dark forest 1
description: You are in a dark forest, full of tall and rather strange trees.

title: Dark forest 2
description: You are in a dark forest. It is early autumn.

title: Dark forest 3
description: You are in a dark forest, tall trees  are all around.

title: Entrance
description: You are inside the building. Although quite dingy, this place is certainly impressive. Passages go east-west past the exit in the south. Crumbling wooden stairs climb to the next floor.

title: Make-up room
description: You are in a make-up room, and there are various uninteresting things around.

title: Props room
description: You are in a props room, and a mad axe man is here!

title: Costumes room
description: You're in the costumes room. None of the lavish costumes remain.

title: Corridor 1
description: You're in a corridor that goes north and east. Rooms are to the south and west.

title: Corridor 2
description: You're in a north to south corridor which has a doorway on the west.

title: Corridor 4
description: You're in a corridor that twists east and south. There is a doorway to the north.

title: Corridor 5
description: You're in a corridor that goes east/west.

title: Corridor 6
description: You're in a corridor that twists west and south. There is a door on the east side.

title: Kitchen
description: You are in a kitchen, where a witch is stirring a strange mixture in a large cauldron. (The mixture is in  the cauldron, not the witch)

title: Corridor 7
description: You are in a north-south corridor. East of here lies a room labelled 'Developing Room.'

title: Darkish room
description: You are in a darkish room, illuminated only by a red glowing button.

title: Corridor 8
description: You're in a passage that goes around the corner, North and West. There is a doorway on the East.

title: North of ballroom
description: You are on the north section of a set which has been created as a ballroom, stretching out to the south. There is an western exit.

title: Centre of ballroom
description: You're in the centre of a grand ballroom.

title: South of ballroom
description: You're on the south side of the ballroom set. There is a doorway south of here.

title: Tank of water
description: You are on another set, next to a tank of water, perhaps left there for some boating scene. The exit lies to the north.

title: In the tank
description: You're in a tank of water. Because the water is so dirty it is hard to discern any details. The only exit is out!

title: Halfway stairs
description: You are now halfway up these somewhat rickety stairs. The wood is particularly rotten at this point.

title: Backyard
description: You are in the back yard. A southern doorway leads back into the building and a shed lies nearby.

title: Small shed
description: You are in a small shed. There is a large cardboard box here on the ground.

title: Landing above stairs
description: You are on the landing above the stairs. A passage goes east-west and there is a door to the north.

title: Corridor 9
description: You're in a corridor. Directions are north and west.

title: Corridor 10
description: You are in a passage that goes north around a corner, south around a different corner or east into another corridor.

title: Corridor 11
description: You are in a corridor outside a room north and a room to the east. A westerly passage leads back out.

title: Dusty bedroom
description: You're in a dusty bedroom. A heavy carpet lies on the floor.

title: Keep-fit room
description: You're in a keep-fit room. An exercisebike is fixed to the floor.

title: Corridor 12
description: You're in a corridor that goes east and south.

title: Corner
description: You're in a corner. Corridors go east and north. A stairway goes up.

title: Old bedroom
description: You're in an old bedroom.

title: South of attic
description: You're above the stairway in the southside of the attic.

title: North of attic
description: You're in a north section of the attic. A large mirror is on the east side.

title: Odd room 1
description: You're in an odd room. There are the following: A red door in the north wall,a yellow door in the east wall, and a blue door to the south. An exit lies west.

title: Odd room 2
description: You are in another odd room, which hasa blue door north, a white door south and a purple door east.

title: Narrow ledge
description: You're outside the building on a narrow ledge which starts here and goes east.

title: Odd room 3
description: You are in an odd room. There is a black door to the north, a brown door to the south and a yellow door to the west.

title: Odd room 4
description: You're in an odd room. A brown door lies north and a red door goes west.

title: Small room
description: You're in a small room which has a glassless window leading out to a narrow ledge.

title: Room w/o exits
description: You have fallen into a room with no apparent exits. Howevar, the walls don't look entirely solid...?

title: Outside large door
description: You are outside a large door. The onlyexits are west back to the exitless room and east through the door.

title: High walled room
description: You are in a high walled room which is quite damp in places. West is a large door, and a passage takes you north.

title: Small room w bandage
description: You are in a small room with the odd bandage here and there.

title: Small room 2
description: You are in a small room. A passage goes south and the exit lies north.

title: Crypt
description: You're in the crypt. There are pass- ages going east and west.

title: Corridor 13
description: You are in a passage that travels north or south. A small avenue goes east.

title: Alley
description: You are in an east/west alley.

title: Large hairy room
description: You're in a large hairy room, where there is only a passage going west There is a chute on the east wall.

title: Large room with PANIC
description: You're in a large room with no exits. A button marked 'PANIC' is here The walls don't budge either!

title: Redecorated room
description: You are in a room which is being re- decorated. A number has been written on the wall: ????? There is a safe imbedded in one wall The message 'somewhere over the rain- bow (There's no place like..) has been written on the wall.

title: East of narrow ledge
description: You are at the eastern extreme of the narrow ledge. A glassless window is in front of me.

title: Death
description: Death
